snippet.title: Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective - Announcement Trailer | iOS / Android
snippet.description:
Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective, the cult classic mystery game from Ace Attorney creator Shu Takumi, is now available for iOS and Android!

https://www.capcom-games.com/product/en-us/ghosttrick-app/

Discord: https://discord.gg/Capcom
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CapcomUSA
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CapcomUSA_
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/CapcomUSA
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/CapcomUSA/

©CAPCOM CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
